select homsitterlist_seq.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO homesitterlist (hsl_num,hs_num,hsl_title,hsl_comment,hsl_size,hsl_care_place,hsl_yard,hsl_baby, hsl_family,hsl_service_type,hsl_pet_age,hsl_writedate,hsl_chkin_str_time,hsl_chkin_end_time,hsl_chkout_str_time,hsl_chkout_end_time,hsl_status) VALUES(#{hsl_num}, #{hs_num}, #{hsl_title}, #{hsl_comment}, #{hsl_size}, #{hsl_care_place}, #{hsl_yard}, #{hsl_baby}, #{hsl_family}, #{hsl_service_type}, #{hsl_pet_age}, sysdate, #{hsl_chkin_str_time}, #{hsl_chkin_end_time}, #{hsl_chkout_str_time}, #{hsl_chkout_end_time},1)
INSERT INTO homesitterdisabledate (hsl_num, hsd_num, hsd_disabledate) VALUES (#{hsl_num}, homesitterdisabledate_seq.nextval, #{hsd_disabledate} )
mapper.select: select trim(hsd.hsd_disabledate), hsl.hsl_num from homesitterlist hsl, homesitterdisabledate hsd where hsd.hsl_num = #{hsl_num} and hsl.hsl_num = hsd.hsl_num(+)
mapper.update: update homesitterlist set hsl_title = #{hsl_title}, hsl_comment = #{hsl_comment}, hsl_size = #{hsl_size}, hsl_care_place = #{hsl_care_place}, hsl_yard = #{hsl_yard}, hsl_baby = #{hsl_baby}, hsl_family = #{hsl_family}, hsl_service_type = #{hsl_service_type}, hsl_pet_age = #{hsl_pet_age}, hsl_writedate = sysdate, hsl_chkin_str_time = #{hsl_chkin_str_time}, hsl_chkin_end_time = #{hsl_chkin_end_time}, hsl_chkout_str_time = #{hsl_hsl_chkout_str_timebaby}, hsl_chkout_end_time = #{hsl_chkout_end_time}, hsl_status = '1' where hsl_status = 0 and hsl_num =#{hsl_num} and hs_num = #{hs_num}
mapper.select: select hsl.hsl_size, hsp.hspr_add_pet_price, hsp.hspr_price from homesitterlist hsl, homesitterprice hsp where hsl.hsl_size like ('%${hsl_size}%') and hsp.hsl_size like ('%${hsl_size}%') and hsp.hsl_service_type like ('%${hsl_service_type}%') and hsl.hsl_service_type like ('%${hsl_service_type}%')

select distinct(hs.hs_num), hs_name,hs_address,hs_d_address,hsl.hsl_num,hsl_title,hsl_size,hsl_service_type,hsc_cmt_count,hs_avgstar,hsl_writedate from (select * from homesitter
hs_num not in (select hsl_num from homesitterdisabledate
where hsd_disabledate not like ('%${hsl.hsr_chkin}%') and hsd_disabledate not like ('%${hsl.hsr_chkout}%')
)
or hs_num in (select hs_num from homesitterreservation
and hsr_chkin not in (SELECT hsr_chkin FROM homesitterreservation where hsr_chkin >= ('%${hsl.hsr_chkin}%') AND hsr_chkin <= ('%${hsl.hsr_chkout}%')) AND hsr_chkout not in (SELECT hsr_chkout FROM homesitterreservation where hsr_chkout >= ('%${hsl.hsr_chkin}%') AND hsr_chkout <= ('%${hsl.hsr_chkout}%'))
)) hs,
(select hs_num, hsl_num, hsl_service_type, hsl_size, hsl_pet_age, hsl_writedate,hsl_status,hsl_title from homesitterlist) hsl,
(select hs_num, count(hs_num) as hsc_cmt_count, round(avg(hsc_star),1) as hs_avgStar from homesittercomment group by hs_num) hsc
AND hsl.hsl_status = 1
AND hs.hs_num = hsl.hs_num(+) AND hs.hs_num = hsc.hs_num(+)
AND hsl.hsl_size like ('%${hsl.hsl_size}%')
AND hsl.hsl_service_type like ('%${hsl.hsl_service_type}%')
AND hs.hs_address in (select hs_address from homesitter where
hs_address like ('%${item}%')
)
order by hsl.hsl_writedate desc

select hs.hs_num,hs_name,hs_address,hs_d_address,hsl.hsl_num,hsl_title,hsl_size,hsl_service_type,hsc_cmt_count,hs_avgstar,hsl_writedate from homesitter hs, homesitterlist hsl, (select hs_num, count(hs_num) as hsc_cmt_count, round(avg(hsc_star),1) as hs_avgStar from homesittercomment group by hs_num) hsc where hs.hs_num = hsl.hs_num(+) and hs.hs_num = hsc.hs_num(+) AND hsl.hsl_status = 1 order by hsl.hsl_writedate desc
SELECT * FROM homesitterlist hsli LEFT OUTER JOIN homesitter hs ON hsli.hs_num = hs.hs_num LEFT OUTER JOIN homesitterlist_image hsi ON hsli.hsl_num = hsi.hsl_num where hsli.hsl_num = #{hsl_num}

select * from homesitter hs, (select hs_num, hsl_num, hsl_service_type, hsl_size, hsl_pet_age from homesitterlist) hsl, (select hs_num, count(hs_num) as hsc_cmt_count, round(avg(hsc_star),1) as hs_avgStar from homesittercomment group by hs_num) hsc where hs.hs_num = hsl.hs_num(+) and hs.hs_num = hsc.hs_num(+) order by hs.hs_num
select hsl_img_filename from homesitterlist hsl, homesitterlist_image hslI where hsl.hsl_num = hslI.hsl_num(+) and hsl.hsl_num = #{hsl_num}
select count(*) from homesitterlist where hs_num = #{hs_num}
